title: Blue / Orange essance shop?
body: whats this ive been hearing about that were gonna get rid of ip and blue essence is how you buy champs?

replies.body: We started giving out information about this conversion not too long ago, but [**this article**](http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/09/upcoming-changes-to-leveling-ip-rewards/) covers most of the info you'll need as we prepare for the switch!
After the conversion of IP to Blue Essence (BE), everything will be bought with BE instead of IP.
also this site says there will be an ip and blue essence and mix together and if tht is true if I have 900 Blue essence and 1000 ip id have 1900 all together and could buy a champion?
Yes, I believe that they will be merging Blue Essence with IP.
